title: How to turn off "conversation view" on my MS Exchange email accounts on Pixel 4?
content: I am able to turn Conversation View on/off easily in settings for my Gmail account, but for my work emails which are MS Exchage acounts, I cannot find any way to turn that off. Any suggestions? Is there a way to add an MS Exchange email account that would allow me to do so? I am so frustrated trying to locate specific emails that are embedded in conversation view format!
